= Siyam Rupali ANSI

== General

Siyam Rupali ANSI is a Bengali font created by the OmicronLab, hinted by Md.
Tanbin Islam Siyam and is a modified version of the Rupali font of the Ekushey
project (see README.Rupali.adoc). This font is developed Under Avro Free Bangla
Font Project.

The font is available from:

* https://www.omicronlab.com/bangla-fonts.html

== Testing

The Siyam Rupali ANSI font is included here as a broken font fixture for testing
purposes.

This font has these errors reported by macOS Font Book and `ftxvalidator`:

* 'sbit' embedded bitmap structure


== Report

A full report generated by `ftxvalidator` on macOS 15.7 (XCode 26 Font Tools)
is included at `ftxvalidator-validation.plist`.

To reproduce the report, run the following command on macOS:

[source,sh]
----
ftxvalidator -r -o spec/fixtures/fonts/Rupali/ftxvalidator-validation.plist \
  spec/fixtures/fonts/Rupali/Rupali_0.72.ttf
----
